title: Form Europe - Europa Universalis IV mod
description:
Form Europe - Europa Universalis IV mod

Extract 7zip to your C:Users[user]Documents Paradox Interactive Europa Universalis IV mod folder



DESCRIPTION
Form Western Europe (Europa) and Eastern Europe as an european country 

- Europe has always been at war, but now a nation could finally bring them all under one banner. 
- Form a nation in Eastern Europe that can resist Ottoman invasions and Imperial claims. 

'Europa' requires the following provinces to be formed: 
- Brabant (City of Brussels, the 'capital' of the European Union) 
- Rome (The Eternal City) 
- Ile-de-france (France) 
- Lombardia (Italy) 
- Barcelona (Iberian peninsula) 
- Wien (Austria, HRE) 
- Mainz (Southern Germany, the most important archbishop in the HRE) 
- Lubeck (Northern Germany) 

'Eastern Europe' requires the following provinces to be formed: 
- Warszawa 
- Krakow 
- Kiev 
- Moskva 
- Novgorod 
- Serbia 
- Bessarabia 
- Riga 
- Pest 

To form the 'United Europe' you need all the provinces required for Europa and Eastern Europe and the following: 
- Stockholm 
- SjÃƒÂ¦lland 
- Hamburg

- Athens 
- Madrid 
- Lisboa 
- London 


National Ideas: 

Europa: 
- Start: Naval Forcelimit +25% / Siege Ability +20 % 
- Bonus: Technology Cost -10% 
- The reconquista (Spain): Discipline +2.5% / Colonists +1 
- Habsburg Dominance (Austria and HRE): Diplomatic Reputation +5 
- Royal Navy (England): Yearly naval tradition +0.25 / Heavy ship combat ability +10% 
- Dutch trading spirit (Netherlands): Merchants +1 / Trade range +10% 
- Zunft (Germany): Production efficiency +10% 
- Path to citizenship (Italy): Core creation cost -25% 
- LibertÃƒÂ©, ÃƒÂ©galitÃƒÂ©, fraternitÃƒÂ© (France): Tolerance of heretics +2 / Tolerance of heathens +2 

Eastern Europe: 
- Start: Core creation cost -25% / National tax modifier +10% 
- Bonus: Technology Cost -10% 
- Statutes of Lituania (Lituania): Revolt Risk -2 
- Mercenary Armies (Serbia): Mercenary cost -20% 
- Control of the Hanseatic Kontor (Novgorod): Merchants +1 / Global Trade power +5% 
- Folwark system (Poland): Production efficiency +10% 
- Repopulation of the countryside (Byzantium): National manpower +10% / Goods produced nationally +5% 
- Sudebnik (Russia): Core creation cost -15% 
- Create the Estates General (Hungary): Negative religious tolerance no longer gives any penalties 


Governments: 

Western Europe: 

- European Monarchy : 
Land forcelimit +20% 
Core creation cost -10% 
Morale of armies +10% 

- European Republic (election every 4 years) : 
Revolt risk -2 
Tax +15% 
Accepted culture threshold -25% 

- Aristocratic republic of Europe (election every 6 years, can marry) : 
Trade efficency +10% 
Production effinciency +10% 
Land maintenance -10% 

Eastern Europe : 

- European empire : 
Discipline +7.5% 
Global manpower modifier +25% 
Aggressive expansion impact -15% 

- European elective monarchy (elective monarchy meccanics) : 
Legitimacy per year +1 
Stability cost modifier -20% 
Accepted culture threshold -25% 

- European dictatorship (election every 8 years, can marry) : 
Cavarly combat ability +15% 
Production efficency +20% 
Discipline +5% 

When you form one of the two europe and the government has been chosen, you'll get access to the faction sistem: 
Aristocratics 
Bourgeoisie 
Parlamentarians 

We are going to change the factions for yevropa later on.
